name: Atari 2600 - Breakout
description:
Play Breakout on a recreation of an Atari 2600.

Get a drink, relax, and have a good time.

Controls

  • Escape: Quit the game
  • WASD/Arrow Keys/Controller Joystick: Move paddle left and right
  • Space/Enter/Return: Start Breakout game

Disclaimer: low-end machines may have weird collision inaccuracies with the Breakout game.
